description:
Saki is distributing newspapers that contain a special promotion which contains a free admission ticket to “Waterland”. The ladies find this ticket and get all excited about going to Waterland. Haruka just wants her and her friends to go so she takes Saki’s ticket. Everyone still wants to go and is willing to pay their own way. Kana is taken to the department store to buy a bathing suit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My First Time at the Pool
はじめての, プール
